title: Handicrafts Exhibition & Fair by award winning crafts persons from India and Sri Lanka opens for public
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma India and Sri Lanka jointly organized the Handicrafts Exhibition & Fair by award winning crafts persons from India and Sri Lanka at the National Art Gallery, Ananda Coomaraswamy MawathaColombo-07. The exhibition was inaugurated by the Minister of Traditional Industries and Small Enterprise Development and the High Commissioner of India…
